downloadTitle: Security Update for Microsoft Report Viewer 2005 Service Pack 1 Redistributable Package (KB2579115)
downloadDescription: The Microsoft Report Viewer Redistributable 2005 Service Pack 1 package includes an update to an XSS (Cross-Site Scripting) vulnerability.
detailsSection: This release includes an update to a security issue that has been identified leading to an XSS (Cross-Site Scripting) vulnerability. You can protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Change.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
additionalInformationSection: Please see the Knowledge Base Articles KB2579115 for more information.
